document.heading: Omnibus Public Safety Ex-offender Self-sufficiency Reform Amendment Act of 2004

history.narrative: Law 15-357, the “Omnibus Public Safety Ex-offender Self-sufficiency Reform Amendment Act of 2004”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 15-785, which was referred to the Committee on Judiciary. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 9, 2004, and December 21, 2004, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on January 19, 2005, it was assigned Act No. 15-744 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 15-357 became effective on May 24, 2005.
